cards.name: Grassland
cards.description: Rolling green plains stretch as far as the eye can see, dotted with wildflowers and grazing animals.

cards.name: Desert
cards.description: Vast expanses of sand dunes and rocky outcrops under a blazing sun, where only the hardiest creatures survive.

cards.name: Forest
cards.description: Dense woodlands filled with towering trees, mysterious shadows, and the sounds of wildlife.

cards.name: Mountain
cards.description: Towering peaks crowned with snow, their slopes steep and treacherous but rich with minerals.

cards.name: Ocean
cards.description: Endless waters that stretch to the horizon, teeming with marine life and hidden depths.

cards.name: City
cards.description: A bustling metropolis where thousands of people live, work, and trade in crowded streets.

cards.name: Village
cards.description: A small, peaceful settlement where everyone knows their neighbors and life moves at a gentle pace.

cards.name: Castle
cards.description: A mighty fortress of stone and iron, home to nobles and defended by loyal knights.

cards.name: Cave
cards.description: Dark underground chambers that may hide treasure, danger, or ancient secrets.

cards.name: Event
cards.description: Something significant is about to happen that will change the course of history.
